title: The Fall of Israel
summary: Because of continued disobedience and idolatry, Israel is conquered by Assyria. The people are exiled, and foreigners are resettled in the land. These new settlers mix worship of the Lord with idolatry, beginning a pattern of syncretism.

faq.question: Why was Israel exiled to Assyria?
faq.answer: Because they persistently disobeyed God and worshipped idols despite repeated warnings.

faq.question: What happened to the land after Israelâ€™s exile?
faq.answer: Foreigners were brought in and mixed their religions with worship of the Lord.
